quality_check_questions.thinking_process: The instruction specifies transforming the dancer into a 3D chibi-style rendition. This involves assessing whether the character has been resized and stylized appropriately.
quality_check_questions.question: Is the dancer depicted in a 3D chibi-style?

quality_check_questions.question: Is the dancer positioned stepping through a glowing elliptical portal?
